input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Gender has a direct effect on department competitiveness and lactose intolerance. Department competitiveness has a direct effect on lactose intolerance. Method 1: We look at how gender correlates with lactose intolerance case by case according to department competitiveness. Method 2: We look directly at how gender correlates with lactose intolerance in general. To understand how gender affects lactose intolerance, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
